explains: vi. 答辩；回答；重新聚合
vt. 再加入；使……再结合；再回答

sentences.en: Mimi and her family went off to Tunisia to rejoin her father.
sentences.cn: 咪咪和她的家人前往突尼斯与父亲团聚。

sentences.en: The prime minister of Fiji has said Fiji is in no hurry to rejoin the Commonwealth.
sentences.cn: 斐济总理称斐济并不急于重返英联邦。

sentences.en: Let us go back again for a moment to the year 1945 and rejoin Chiang Kai-shek in his rock-ribbed refuge at Chungking.
sentences.cn: 让我们再用一点时间回顾一下一九四五年，当时蒋介右避居在山城重庆。
